    • Jul 20, 2016 - ssh rsa

    1.ssh-keygen -t rsa

    2.在 ~/.ssh/config中添加

    	Host lfs-cn-manage 
	  HostName localhost  #这里写ip
	  User aiming
	  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa.aiming

    3.chmod 666 ~/.ssh/config #勿忘

    4.将pub key 添加到服务端的 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys 中

    搞定！
